description: Used by practically nobody else but armed police forces, the Traffic & Riot Control Craft is the primary vehicle deployed for mass-traffic regulation in transit lanes. It is, however, also in broad use for many other police operations, which is why its base configuration includes an, albeit weak, assault weapon. Other applications for this type of craft include sector patrol, crowd control, special operations, and citizen intelligence (also known as pro-active neighbourhood surveillance).
name: Traffic & Riot Control Craft
